ygData.subject: Re: Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: I wonder, what is the value of training in any of the non-old languages, such as gnoll and lizardman?  Old Erudian and the other languages that might benefit
ygData.messageBody:
I wonder, what is the value of training in any of the "non-old" languages,
such as gnoll and lizardman? Old Erudian and the other languages that might
benefit us in spell research make sense. But if every creature speaks common
at a minimum, why spend any time or practices learning these languages? I
must be missing something.

- Axiome (Bertxxx)
